message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and agree on $125?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $120 is my final offer. If you can't agree to that, I'm afraid I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
I understand you're trying to be fair, but I'm not willing to go above $115. Can you reconsider and meet me at that price?
